trans_title: 国家地理：透视美国空军救援队 第一季
introduction: The elite Combat Rescue members of the U.S. Air Force, Pararescuemen, or PJs, have one mission: rescue American or Allied forces in extreme danger. Whether their targets are shot down or isolated behind enemy lines, surrounded, engaged, wounded, or captured by the enemy, PJs will do whatever necessary to bring those in peril home. For the first time in their history, the PJs al...
chinese_title: 国家地理：透视美国空军救援队 第一季
